thread.section_title: Foreign and national political news and analysis - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: AP Exclusive: Panama condo owners to Trump: You're fired!
thread.title_full: AP Exclusive: Panama condo owners to Trump: You're fired! - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Jeff Horwitz, Associated Press
title: AP Exclusive: Panama condo owners to Trump: You're fired!
text: Photo: Arnulfo Franco, AP FILE - In this photo June 28, 2011, file photo, stairs run up the Trump Ocean Club International Hotel and Tower in Panama City, Panama. The tale of the 70-story waterfront tower along Panama Bay that was managed by the Trump empire offers insight into the Republican presidential candidate's business traits, and hints about the management style that might be expected from a Trump White House. FILE - In this photo June 28, 2011, file photo, stairs run up the... PANAMA CITY (AP) — The directors of a massive Trump-branded luxury condominium development in Panama fired Donald Trump's company in the summer over allegations of mismanagement, overspending and undisclosed bonuses executives paid themselves, according to an Associated Press examination. FILE - In this photo June 28, 2011, file photo, stairs run up the Trump Ocean Club International Hotel and Tower in Panama City, Panama. The tale of the 70-story waterfront tower along Panama Bay that was managed by the Trump empire offers insight into the Republican presidential candidate's business traits, and hints about the management style that might be expected from a Trump White House. FILE - In this photo June 28, 2011, file photo, stairs run up the... PANAMA CITY (AP) — The directors of a massive Trump-branded luxury condominium development in Panama fired Donald Trump's company in the summer over allegations of mismanagement, overspending and undisclosed bonuses executives paid themselves, according to an Associated Press examination.
